name: Kubernetes
summary: Container orchestration software, extremely flexible but with a steep learning curve. Can support all manners of use cases, which is both a strength its main issue. Can make sense at scale, but requires an ops team to manage. No LTS release.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.body: Software itself is free, but managed options exist (AWS EKS/GCP GKE/Azure AKS), usually around 70$/month + costs for the compute resources used

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.body: Many extensions and a lot of tooling exists around Kubernetes, the list of CNCF projects is a good starting point
